assistant.title: Assistant

cover.title: Automated health risk assessment and prediction system using artificial intelligence methods
cover.subtitle: Analytical Report
cover.author: Kinash Stanislav Andriyovych
cover.footer: Created with the support of artificial intelligence algorithms.

closing.secondaryText: The analysis and prediction system is designed to help make better decisions.
closing.thanks: Thank you for caring about your health!
closing.footer: Created with the support of artificial intelligence algorithms.

keyFactors.title: Key factors that influenced the risk:

low.1: Continue to maintain a healthy lifestyle

medium.1: It is recommended to consult a doctor
medium.2: Undergo additional examinations to clarify the condition
medium.3: Pay attention to factors affecting the risk
medium.4: Consider the possibility of lifestyle correction

high.1: Immediately consult a doctor for a detailed examination
high.3: Discuss a treatment and prevention plan with your doctor
high.4: Follow all recommendations of medical personnel

footer.description: HealthRisk.AI — automated health risk assessment and prediction system using artificial intelligence methods.
footer.disclaimer: This report is not a medical diagnosis and does not replace a doctor's consultation.

theme.title: Select {{format}} theme
theme.subtitle: By default, we use the active site theme.

dark.title: Dark
dark.description: Contrast dark theme for night mode of the site

errors.selectParamsMessage: Please select a prediction and report format.

excel.libraryErrorMessage: Excel library not loaded. Please refresh the page.

sections.keyFactors: Key factors that influenced the risk

sections.keyFactors: === KEY FACTORS THAT INFLUENCED THE RISK ===

profileOverview.title: Your Profile: Key Indicators
profileOverview.subtitle: Comparison of last entered values with recommended limits for a healthy person.
profileOverview.note: Colors indicate whether the indicator is within normal, warning, or risk zone.
profileOverview.empty: To see personal diagrams, first calculate risks on the "Prediction Form" page.

riskComparison.title: Risks by Model
riskComparison.subtitle: Comparison of calculated diabetes and obesity risks for your profile.
riskComparison.note: Risks are displayed as percentages, where the full scale corresponds to 100%.
riskComparison.empty: Calculate diabetes and obesity risks to see the comparison.

factors.title: Factor Importance
factors.subtitle: Indicators that most influenced the last prediction. Hover to read explanations.
factors.note: Positive values indicate a greater influence of the factor on increasing risk.
factors.empty: Top factors will appear after the first successful prediction.

bmi.title: BMI Distribution in Sample
bmi.subtitle: Shows what percentage of people from the NHANES sample are in each body mass category.
bmi.note: Compare your BMI with typical population values.

bp.title: Blood Pressure Categories
bp.subtitle: Proportion of people with different blood pressure levels in the dataset.
bp.note: "Normal" — up to 120/80 mmHg, "Hypertension Stage 2" — 140/90 mmHg and above.

cholesterol.title: Cholesterol Levels
cholesterol.subtitle: Distribution of total cholesterol in the NHANES sample.

diabetesAge.title: Diabetes by Age Groups
diabetesAge.subtitle: What proportion of people in each age group have diabetes (self-reported).
diabetesAge.note: Proportion calculated as percentage of participants with diabetes within the group.

obesityAge.title: Obesity by Age Groups
obesityAge.subtitle: Shows how the proportion of people with obesity changes across different age groups.

correlations.title: Factor Correlations
correlations.subtitle: How closely related the main indicators are to each other in the sample.
correlations.note: Values from -1 to 1: the closer to 1, the stronger the positive relationship between indicators.
correlations.empty: Insufficient data for all factors in this chart. Make sure all key indicators are present in the dataset.

historyTimeline.title: Prediction History
historyTimeline.subtitle: Dynamics of risk probabilities over time for your predictions.
historyTimeline.note: Lines show the change in risk probability for each target over time.
historyTimeline.empty: To see diagrams, first perform at least one prediction on the "Prediction Form" page.

historyRiskDistribution.title: Distribution by Risk Categories
historyRiskDistribution.subtitle: Number of your predictions for each risk category for each target.
historyRiskDistribution.note: Shows how many predictions you made in each risk category.
historyRiskDistribution.empty: To see diagrams, first perform at least one prediction on the "Prediction Form" page.

historyModels.title: Used Models
historyModels.subtitle: Proportion of predictions made with different machine learning models.
historyModels.note: Chart shows which models you used most frequently.
historyModels.empty: To see diagrams, first perform at least one prediction on the "Prediction Form" page.

assistant.placeholder: Ask something about your predictions or health...

prediction.title: Prediction form
prediction.modelTooltip:
Logistic Regression — basic linear model, shows the impact of each indicator.
Random Forest — ensemble of decision trees, robust to noise.
XGBoost — powerful boosting for tabular data.
LightGBM — fast gradient boosting implementation.
SVM — finds optimal boundary between classes.
KNN — compares with similar patients (neighbors).
Neural Network (MLP) — detects complex nonlinear relationships.

voice.notSupportedMessage: Browser does not support voice input.
voice.permissionDeniedMessage: Allow access in browser settings and try again.

tooltips.modelHelp:
Logistic Regression — basic linear model, shows the impact of each indicator.
Random Forest — ensemble of decision trees, robust to noise.
XGBoost — powerful boosting for tabular data.
LightGBM — fast gradient boosting implementation.
SVM — finds optimal boundary between classes.
KNN — compares with similar patients (neighbors).
Neural Network (MLP) — detects complex nonlinear relationships.

features.BMXBMI: Body Mass Index (kg/m²). Over 30 may indicate obesity.
features.BPXSY1: Systolic blood pressure (upper value) in mmHg.
features.BPXDI1: Diastolic blood pressure (lower value) in mmHg.

sidebar.logo: Automated health risk assessment and prediction system using artificial intelligence methods

deleteHistory.title: Delete prediction?
deleteHistory.message: Are you sure you want to delete this prediction from history? This action is irreversible, but you can always make a new prediction.
deleteHistory.allConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all {{count}} {{predictions}}?
deleteHistory.selectedConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} {{predictions}}?

deleteAvatar.title: Delete profile photo?
deleteAvatar.message: Are you sure you want to delete your current profile photo? After deletion, the default avatar with your initial will be restored.
deleteAvatar.warning: This action can be undone by uploading a new photo.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account?
deleteAccount.message: This action is irreversible. After deleting your account:
deleteAccount.item1: All your personal data will be deleted
deleteAccount.item2: All prediction history will be lost
deleteAccount.item3: It will be impossible to restore the account
deleteAccount.warning: Are you sure you want to continue?

blockUser.title: Block user?
blockUser.message: Are you sure you want to block user "{{userName}}"?
blockUser.afterBlock1: You will not be able to exchange messages
blockUser.afterBlock2: Chat with this user will be hidden
blockUser.afterBlock3: The user will not be able to send you messages

unblockUser.title: Unblock user?
unblockUser.message: Are you sure you want to unblock user "{{userName}}"?
unblockUser.afterUnblock1: You will be able to exchange messages
unblockUser.afterUnblock2: Chat with this user will become available
unblockUser.afterUnblock3: The user will be able to send you messages

deleteChat.title: Delete chat?
deleteChat.message: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? All messages will be deleted.
